content.text: Hi, my name is Anya, how are you today?
Hey Anya, I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm Isaiah, what do you do for fun?
I love to go on adventures, I'm a sales person so I get to see new places all the time. What about you?
I work for a marketing agency, so I do a lot of research and writing. I also like to read and listen to music.
That's cool, I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, and I'm also a big fan of the Hunger Games books.
I've never read the Hunger Games, but I've heard good things about them. I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should, they're really good. What's your favorite movie?
I love the Lord of the Rings trilogy, and I also really like the James Bond movies.
Those are both great movies! I'm more of a comedy fan myself, but I can appreciate a good action movie.
I like comedies too, but I'm a sucker for a good story.
Me too, that's why I love the Lord of the Rings trilogy so much. It's got a great story and amazing visuals.
I agree, it's one of my favorite movies of all time.
Mine too! What are some of your other favorite movies?
I also love the Shawshank Redemption, the Princess Bride, and the Matrix.
Those are all great movies! I've seen all of them except the Matrix.
You should definitely check it out, it's a great sci-fi movie.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
